data.title: Leipzig Hbf → Berlin by Train from €5.48
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Leipzig Hbf to Berlin in 1h 4m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Leipzig Hbf to Berlin today.
data.text:
If you want to know more about the journey from Leipzig Hbf to Berlin by train, look no further!

The average journey time from Leipzig Hbf to Berlin by train is 1 hour 29 minutes, although on the fastest services it can take just 1 hour 4 minutes. Around 35 trains per day travel the 92 miles (148 km) between these two destinations. Direct trains are usually available every day on the route to Berlin. You're likely to be travelling with ICE, DB or FlixTrain to Berlin. As the main train operators on this route, all offer plenty of space for luggage and comfortable seating as standard.

Book train tickets from Leipzig Hbf to Berlin in advance instead of buying them on the day and they can start from €5.48. We'll always highlight the cheapest prices when you search in our Journey Planner.

Ready to book? Start your search for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times, as well as tips on how to find cheap train tickets.
